oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Onset of a different scattering mechanism with Fe and Mn substitution in the magneto-transport of a-Co80-x-yFexMnyB12Si8 alloys
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: PIRAMANAYAGAM, SN
PRASAD, S
NIGAM, AK
CHANDRA, G
SHRINGI, SN
VENKATARAMANI, N
KRISHNAN, R
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: resistivity
magnetoresistance
disordered systems
electronic transport properties
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Magnetoresistance measurements were carried out on a-Co80-x-yFexMnyB12Sig alloys at various temperatures and fields. The negative slope after technical saturation, in Co-rich alloys and in Fe- rich alloys not containing Mn, appears to arise because of a reduction in the density of spin waves with field. On the other hand, at higher concentrations of Fe and Mn, another scattering mechanism seems to set in which gives rise to a positive slope in the magnetoresistance curves.
